Tim Pengacara: Eni Saragih Sering Ajak Ketemu Sofyan Basir
05 Nov 2019, 09:22 by Mosita Dwi Septiasputri


Tim Pengacara: Eni Saragih Sering Ajak Ketemu Sofyan Basir

KBRN, Jakarta : Tim Pengacara Sofyan Basir, Heru Widodo mengungkap bahwa Eks Wakil Ketua Komisi VII DPR Eni Maulani Saragih lebih banyak melakukan inisiasi pertemuan kepada Mantan Direktur Utama (Dirut) PT. PLN (Persero) Sofyan Basir. "Pertemuan yang menginisiasi pertemuan selalu Ibu Eni dan dalam pertemuan tersebut Ibu Eni hanya diam," jelasnya kepada RRI (5/11/2019).Ia menyebut dalam pertemuan tersebut mereka hanya membahas soal negosiasi harga dan jangka waktu. 
baca juga : Vonis Bebas Sofyan Basir
"Ternyata pertemuan itu bicaranya soal negosiasi harga, jangka waktu, investor maunya konsorsium yang dibangun jangka waktu pengelolaannya 20 tahun menurut perpres ya 15 tahun jadi pak Sofyan enggak mau," katanya.Heru mengungkapkan bahwa didalam persidangan perkara, lanjutnya, Eni Saragih dan pemegang saham Blackgold Natural Resources Limited, Johannes Budisutrisno Kotjo sudah terjadi suap."Sementara ternyata didalam persidangan perkara bu Eni dan pak Kotjo dan perkara Sofyan Basir itu suap itu sudah terjadi pada saat bu Eni dan pak Kotjo komitmen untuk berbagi fee dan belum pernah ketemu Sofyan sehingga untuk pembantuan itu ada diluar ring tindak pidana pokoknya," katanya.Heru menyatakan pertemuan terlihat intensif dikarenakan project PLTU Riau-1 merupakan project kemitraan dan berdasarkan Perpres, PLN menunjuk anak perusahaan pembangkit untuk mencari investor."Ini memang model baru, pola baru pertama kali diterapkan di PLTU Riau 1 sehingga diperlukan pertemuan intensif antara direksi dan calon investor," katanya."Jadi kalau soal pertemuan soal itu, clear," tutupnya.Sebelumnya, Mantan Direktur Utama (Dirut) PT. PLN (Persero) Sofyan Basir divonis bebas oleh Ketua Majelis Hakim Pengadilan Tindak Pidana (Tipikor) dalam kasus dugaan korupsi suap  proyek pembangunan Pembangkit Listrik Tenaga Uap (PLTU) Riau-1.Sofyan Basir didampingi pengacara sekaligus kuasa hukumnya Susilo Arwibowo dan keluarganya tampak dilihat keluar meninggalkan Rumah Tahanan (Rutan) KPK pada sekitar pukul 17.50 WIB, Senin (4/11/2019).

Lawyers Team: Eni Saragih Often Invites to Meet Sofyan Basir
05 Nov 2019, 09:22 by Mosita Dwi Septiasputri


Lawyers Team: Eni Saragih Often Invites to Meet Sofyan Basir

KBRN, Jakarta: Sofyan Basir's Attorney Team, Heru Widodo revealed that the Ex-Deputy Chairperson of the House of Representatives Commission VII Eni Maulani Saragih had initiated more meetings with the Former Managing Director of PT. PLN (Persero) Sofyan Basir. "The meeting that initiates the meeting is always Mrs. Eni and in the meeting Mrs. Eni is just silent," he explained to RRI (11/05/2019). He mentioned in the meeting they only discussed the matter of price and time negotiations.
Also read: Sofyan Basir's Free Verdict
"It turned out that the meeting talked about price negotiations, timeframe, investors wanted a consortium that was set up to a 20-year management period according to the presidential decree of 15 years so Pak Sofyan did not want to," he said. Heru revealed that in the trial, he continued, Eni Saragih and shareholders Blackgold Natural Resources Limited, Johannes Budisutrisno Kotjo has already taken a bribe. "While it turns out that in the trial of Mrs. Eni and Mr. Kotjo and Sofyan Basir, the bribery had already taken place when Mrs. Eni and Mr. Kotjo committed to share fees and had never met Sofyan. The assistance is outside the main crime ring, "he said. Heru said the meeting looked intensive because the Riau-1 PLTU project was a partnership project and based on the Presidential Regulation, PLN appointed a power plant subsidiary to look for investors." This is indeed a new model, a new pattern was first applied in Riau Power Plant 1 so that intensive meetings between directors are needed and prospective investors, "he said." So when it comes to meetings, clear, "he concluded. Previously, the Former President Director (Managing Director) of PT. PLN (Persero) Sofyan Basir was acquitted by the Chief Judge of the Criminal Court (Tipikor) in the case of alleged bribery corruption in the Riau-1. Steam Power Plant development project. Sofyan Basir was accompanied by a lawyer as well as his attorney Susilo Arwibowo and his family seemed to be seen outside. left the KPK Detention Center at around 17.50 West Indonesia Time on Monday (11/04/2019).
